EmailTemplate.name: Interview Change
EmailTemplate.subject: Interview Change Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello!
Your {!Interview__c.Type_Of_Interview__c} interview for {!Interview__c.00N40000001K6uo} scheduled for {!Interview__c.Start_Date__c} at {!Interview__c.Account_X__c} with {!Interview__c.Hiring_Manager__c} for the {!Interview__c.Job_Name__c}, has changed.
Your {!Interview__c.Type_Of_Interview__c} interview is now scheduled for {!Interview__c.Start_Date__c} at {!Interview__c.Account_X__c} with {!Interview__c.Hiring_Manager__c}.
Please contact [insert Recruiter Name] you have any additional questions or concerns.
Good luck and have a great day!
